name: MY BLACK HOLE
description:
It is puts the player's aiming skills to the test!

You  must feed your  black hole pet  with the items that it demands.
The feeding is carried out through the launch of 3D objects, you can move away or approach your pet by moving through the space in which you place it to get it right and see it grow.

Made by Majocamcam and HideousArmor :)
